filtersPack

Class HelpFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • filtersPack.HelpFilter

  • public class HelpFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains function that "help" to the filters functions(filters class). The functions of the filters use those functions. function that save the largest signal. function swap. function that convert from String To Date. function that calculate the distance between two points.
    Author:
